long_description: Built tough, but with style, the Marmot Leyden Plaid shirt hides its trail-worthy features well so you can head straight from the office to your mountain adventure. Packable, abrasion-resistant Supplex(R) nylon/polyester fabric blend wicks moisture and dries fast to keep you comfortable when you're working up a sweat on the trail. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Gusseted underarms allow a full range of motion. Zippered chest pocket. The Marmot Leyden Plaid shirt has a regular fit.
short_description: Built tough, but with style, the Marmot Leyden Plaid shirt hides its trail-worthy features well so you can head straight from the office to your mountain adventure.
